items.sentence: The children watched TV while Tom cooked dinner.
The only free seat left was the one next to Tom.
Tom always carries a map and compass in his bag.
Tom and I have known each other for a long time.
I expect him to take care of my younger brother.
I find it difficult to express myself in French.
I get nervous whenever I go through immigration.
I had to study French when I was in high school.
This has nothing to do with why Tom isn\'t here.
The bus driver and three passengers were killed.
